articles.title: Schools, colleges in Sindh to remain closed till Aug 19: Sindh education minister
articles.description: Says vaccinations will be mandatory for teachers; outlines three-fold approach to reforms in education sector.
articles.content:
Sindh Education Minister Syed Sardar Ali Shah said on Sunday that schools and colleges will remain closed till August 19 in view of the rising incidence of coronavirus cases.

articles.title: Your Nvidia RTX GPU doesn’t just play games - it helps you make them too
articles.description: Nvidia RTX graphics cards can be optimized for better results across a host of powerful applications used through the gaming industry.
articles.content: You love video games, right? That’s likely the reason you have a gaming-optimized graphics card after all, or are at least in the market for one. It’s been a rocky few months for anyone trying to buy a GeForce RTX 30 series GPU given that this second... [7257 chars]

articles.title: NASA Is Paying People to Live in 3D-Printed Martian Habitat for a Year
articles.description: NASA is looking for participants to spend a year living in Mars Dune Alpha, a Texas-based facility designed to look and feel like the Red Planet.
articles.content:
NASA is looking for volunteers to live on a fake Martian surface for 12 months.
The analog mission will take place inside the Johnson Space Center, in Texas.
Applicants must be aged between 30-35 and in good physical health.

articles.title: 'We challenge you': Congress to Twitter over Rahul Gandhi's locked account
articles.description: The Congress party also tweeted the photograph of Rahul Gandhi meeting the family of the nine-year-old Dalit girl, who died after being raped by a priest and three other men at a crematorium near Delhi Cantonment. | Latest News India

articles.title: Pakistan rejects 'baseless Indian allegations of infiltration' across Line of Control
articles.description: "India must refrain from peddling falsehoods and creating pretexts for false flag operations," says FO spokesperson.
articles.content:
Foreign Office spokesperson Zahid Hafeez Chaudhri on Sunday rejected reports published by Indian media which quoted an Indian official as saying that "terrorists are waiting at launch pads to infiltrate" into occupied Kashmir from Pakistan.

articles.title: 73 new locally transmitted Covid-19 cases in Singapore, including 21 unlinked
articles.description: Of the new cases, 43 were linked to previous infections and had already been quarantined.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - There were 73 new locally transmitted coronavirus cases reported as at noon on Sunday (Aug 8). This is the lowest daily figure since July 17, when there were 60 locally transmitted cases.

articles.title: In a first, ITBP inducts two women officers in combat
articles.description: The two women officers -- Prakriti and Diksha -- will be posted as company commanders in ITBP battalions
articles.content:
In a first, the India-China LAC guarding the Indo-Tibetan Border Police force ( ITBP ) today commissioned its first two women officers in combat after they completed their training in Mussoorie.

articles.title: Ex-magistrate Rodney Higgins breaks silence on relationship with court clerk
articles.description: The retired magistrate, in an interview with A Current Affair, says he deserves a portion of Ashleigh Petrie’s superannuation benefit.
articles.content:
Former Victorian magistrate Rodney Higgins has broken his silence about his relationship with a court clerk 45 years his junior, saying he deserves a portion of her superannuation death benefit.
